Name: Tap Ninja - Idle game
About the game: Start your adventure as a Ninja in this incremental game, destroy incoming enemies with a well-timed Katana Slash, increase your Speed Step combo to multiply your gold and build up your own village. Start up from nothing and rise to a true Ninja Master status. Key Features Destroy incoming enemies, collect coins, earn gold Build up your village to earn even more gold even while you are offline! Buy Research Upgrades to increase your power Ascend and learn epic and permanent Skill Upgrades Challenge levels to perfect Unlock hundreds of Achievements Unlock characters and customize them with dyes Crossplatform cloud saving - take your game on the go! Roadmap for future: More Upgrades and Ascension Skills More Achievements Quests Collectable Pets Conquest mode Forgeable Artifacts Your idea? Share it on the Discord
